column5: That Nitro 290 sport at BPS is a real real good looking boat.  Fiberglass 19.5'  225 merc proXS. 15hp kicker.  cool jump seats in back.  So far it might be my favourite fishing/family boat.  Very smart looking indeed. Only problem for me is that I come up $60,000 short
A little bit down... a little bit every month.. you're happy, they're happy... everybody is happy!!!
Yaaaaaaaa.......agreed........Boat porn, My wife caught me the other night checking her out
I've loooked at it; my fishing buddy is looking for a new boat. The storage is really well-thought out. Really nice boat.....
buy it in the states  http://www.nitro.com/boat/?boat=3110
HAHA got you beat i was only $59,999.99 Short
... and the further south you go, the less white crap you have in the winter!!!   It's the place to be eh!!!
Well....  If thats all is required...........i'll take two of them....

Nitro has been plagued by poor customer service and very bad re-sale values in the states due to their build.  Bad build = lots of calls and warranty work = bad customer service due to calls and warranty work not being handled the way people expect.  There are better choices out there.  Ranger Stratos Triton  Take your pick.

My bud who I do the odd tournament with has a Nitro with a 225 Optimax on it and for the last two years has had a de-lamination problem with his hull on five (5) count em five, separate occasions. He is now looking at taking them to court to do the repair properly. Apparently they have been re-glassing without actually replacing the stringer (shortcut fix) and the fix has been half assed. He also had them repair a lot of spider cracks all over the boat after two years of service. If I were looking to purchase something with a price tag that high I would be looking at Ranger or Princecraft, IMHO.
Yep we looked at it last Thursday.LOOKED.
Might want to talk to Ranger owners.They have had issues aswell.

For that kinda money I'd rather have something like this, and have $20G left to blow on electronic and other goodies.  http://www.donhydemarine.com/searchengine/...rtDir=DESC&  BTW that includes a T top with rocket launchers . yes please

My first real boat will need to be a Triton...nothing huge maybe a 16-18' boat with something in the  one hundred's for HP  As for that 290 by nirto, would love to get it for free but would never buy it myself.
You might want to save some of that $20G to put a motor on that baby. Looks like $40G just buys the boat.

New 2008 Mako Center Consoles for sale @ clearout prices!  -171CC $23,261 w/ Evinrude 90hp Etec -184CC $27,841 w/ Evinrude 115hp Etec -204CC $40,249 w/ Evinrude 175hp Etec & T-top.  Sea-trials available upon request. Please contact Jeff or Brian at Don Hyde Marine for full details and pictures. (905)-768-3267   this text from another ad, seems to indicate the motor is included, I thought it a lot of boat for the money for a Great Lakes angler
really don't have any  issues with mine .
